entry.title: Shakalaka Vet Care and Surgery Vacancies VETERINARY SURGEON

link.title: Shakalaka Vet Care and Surgery Vacancies VETERINARY SURGEON

entry.content:
Shakalaka Vet Care and Surgery is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for VETERINARY SURGEON position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in Veterinary or equivalent.
  • No work experience required.
  • Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply. 
  • Able to examine and treat small animals.
  • Able to diagnose illnesses and determine the best treatment of a wide range of animal conditions.
  • Able to dress wounds of injured animals.
  • Able to prescribe medications to animals.
  • Have the knowledge of neutering cats and dogs.
  • Able to work on weekends and extra hours.
YOU CAN ALSO CALL US AT : 088-778574 / 016-6058586

Company Overview

SHAKALAKA VET CARE AND SURGERY is a veterinary clinic established on the 28th October 2017. Located at Putatan, Sabah. We offer medical services to the surrounding pets, such as consultation, vaccination, neutering, treatment, hospitalizations, laser treatment, ultrasounds, x-ray and do minor to major surgery if necessary.
We are expanding our services and in line with that we are hoping to get a passionate veterinarian to join our awesome team!

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Kota Kinabalu.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Shakalaka Vet Care and Surgery is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the VETERINARY SURGEON which positioned at Kota Kinabalu

entry.title: URGROUP Vacancies Aesthetic Doctor
entry.content:
URGROUP is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Aesthetic Doctor position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job Requirement:
  • At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field
  • Required Skill(s):
  • Preferably Senior Executive specialized in Healthcare - Doctor/Diagnosis or equivalent.
  • Candidate must be a registered doctor with KKM
  • Passion in aesthetic industry
  • Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English, Mandarin

Company Overview

UR Group is a specialist brand of pigmentation treatment through phototherapy and medical aesthetic technoology, led by competent medical professionals and entrepreneurs who have been working in the few for more than a decade. We believe that it is possible and achievable to propel the beauty industry forward with science-backed solutions. The great thing is, we have actually achieved it. Our pigmentation treatment through phototherapy and asthetic medical solutions can be quick, lunchtime procedures, often with immediately visible effects and limited downtime, qualities that contribute to their inclusivity as well as confidentiality.
Besides providing pigmentation treatments, we continuosly prioritize feminine wellness by organizing soul-eriching events and educational sessions. We want women to emanate their femine beauty naturally from their decent appearance, personalities and positive outlook on life. That, I believe, will make our world a more beautiful place. Our genuine effort in building a community of empowered women has bear fruits since past few years.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Penang.
Apply Online
entry.summary: URGROUP is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Aesthetic Doctor which positioned at Penang

entry.title: Klinik Christina Chea Vacancies BEAUTY THERAPIST / AESTHETICIAN

link.title: Klinik Christina Chea Vacancies BEAUTY THERAPIST / AESTHETICIAN

entry.content:
Klinik Christina Chea is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for BEAUTY THERAPIST / AESTHETICIAN position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job Highlights:
  • Good Employment Benefits with Attractive Commission/Staff purchase/Annual Company trip/Intensive training.
  • On the job training provided.
  • MYR 1,800 - MYR 4,000 & above
Job Responsibilities:
  • Perform aesthetics treatment for customers.
  • Perform aesthetics treatment with high standard of customers service.
  • Assisting Drs during treament procedures, ensuring all items are well prepared before procedures.
  • Clearing and keeping treatment rooms clean after every procedure. To ensure all treatmentroom and items are sufficient, well organized & in optimum conditions.
  • Able to perform basis body & facial treatment (eg; perform extractions, operating facial machines) 
  • Handle customer request and enquiries when necessary.
Job ​Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least Professional Certificate such as CIDESCO or any other Beauty & Aesthetic Certification equivalent.
  • Proficiency in: English/Mandarin is preferable.
  • At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Non-Executive specialized in Beauty/Healthcare Industry - Beautician/Therapist.
  • Well groomed with a pleasant personality.
  • Able to start work with short notice.

Company Overview

KLINIK CHRISTINA CHEA is an established, fully licensed aesthetics, skin and laser centre. We seek to deliver high quality medical aesthetics, skin and laser services & products to discerning customers in Malaysia and across the region. We are one of the reputable pioneers in Subang Jaya with more than 10 years in experience. 

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Subang Jaya.

entry.title: JOY ELDERCARE HOME Vacancies Caregiver
entry.content:
JOY ELDERCARE HOME is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Caregiver position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Responsibilities:
  • Assisting with personal care, which may include bathroom functions, bathing, grooming, dressing, and eating.
  • Following a prescribed healthcare plan, which may include assisting with exercise and administering medication.
  • Monitoring and reporting changes in health, behavior, and needs.
Requirements:
  • Education: no requirement
  • Year of Experience: minimum 1 year in eldercare/ patient care industry
  • Skills: Preferred if candidate is equipped with basic nursing skills
  • Job-Type : Full time
  • Must be able to speak in Bahasa Malaysia
  • Added advantage if can speak fluently in Mandarin/English

Company Overview

Joy eldercare home is a unique and well established age care home that is focused on improving the eldercare industry in Malaysia.
We are currently looking for a dedicated Caregiver to join our team. You will be the key person in providing ongoing support for the elders and the Care Service Team.
We offer great training, a happy working environment and competitive employee packages in the sector.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Johor.

entry.title: JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD Vacancies Clinical Associate (Medical Doctor) (Ref: HLL)

link.title: JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD Vacancies Clinical Associate (Medical Doctor) (Ref: HLL)

entry.content:
JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Clinical Associate (Medical Doctor) (Ref: HLL) position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

No night calls!
Attractive Remuneration + Benefits!
Seeking candidates who are willing to join on a 2-year contract basis doing general clinic and ward duties. 
Requirements:
An ideal candidate must be eligible for Conditional Registration with the Singapore Medical Council (SMC) and meet to the requirements below.
  • Basic Medical Degree from a university / medical school listed in the Second Schedule of the Medical Registration Act recognised by the Singapore Medical Council (SMC) 
  • Must have completed 1 year of Housemanship/Internship training
  • Highly adaptive, possess high interpersonal relationship and communication skills
  • Must be an excellent team member

Compensation & Benefits
Our clients offer a competitive salary package. Generally, this includes housing allowance, one-time relocation assistance, medical benefits and annual bonuses.

Interested applicants, kindly furnish your detailed resume in MS Words format to liza.lateb@jobstudio.com.sg or click on the “Apply Now” button.
** We regret to inform only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Applicants who do not possess necessary experience or qualification will still be considered on individual merits and may be contacted for other opportunities. **
JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD
EA License No: 10C4754
EA Personnel: Liza Lateb
EA Personnel Reg No: R1109147

Company Overview

Why JobStudio?
1. We Genuinely Care About You
At JobStudio, we care about how you grow in your career. We make it our priority to understand you, your needs as well as ambitions. While monetary rewards are important, we know it is more than that. A job is about colleagues, opportunities for growth and inspiration. We try to stand in your shoes and understand what you truly want from a job and in life.
2. Rely on a Strong Network
Over the years, we have acquired experience and expertise in many sectors. As a result, we have built strong relationships with major companies, providing us with the latest job openings. More importantly, we know how you work and how you can fit into each company's culture. If you are a professional, JobStudio is able to find the right job for you.

3. You Deserve the Best
Within a short span of seven years, we have made a name for ourselves in the staffing and executive search industry. We hold about 70% of the healthcare recruitment sector. As a testimony to our stellar growth, our founder was awarded with Entrepreneur of the Year Award in 2014. We are confident that we can find the best job for you because we are the best in recruitment.

Our Mission
Our mission is to forge strong relationships by genuinely caring for our candidates and clients.

Our Vision
Building Careers & Growing Companies

Our E.T.H.I.C.S Values
Empathy: Taking a leaf out of your book, we will stand in your shoes.
Trustworthiness: You can trust us like a friend.
Hard Work: We will work hard for you, going that extra mile always.
Innovation: We will continue to look at ways to improve ourselves so that we can serve you better.
Cooperation: We do not just work for you, we work with you.
Success: Ultimately, we want you to succeed in life!
PDPA disclaimer: By submission of your application or resume  to JobStudio, you will be deemed to have consented to JobStudio collecting, using, retaining and / or disclosing your personal information to prospective employers for their consideration. 

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Singapore.
Apply Online
entry.summary: JOBSTUDIO PTE LTD is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Clinical Associate (Medical Doctor) (Ref: HLL) which positioned at Singapore

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Dental Surgery Assistant cum Front Desk

link.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Dental Surgery Assistant cum Front Desk

entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Dental Surgery Assistant cum Front Desk position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Dentalville Sdn Bhd
  • Prepare and sterilise dental instruments and equipment.
  • Perform customer service duties at the front desk such as handling patient registration, appointment booking, answering phone calls and attending to patients' enquiries.
  • Familiarise yourself with and effectively use our patient recall system.
  • Collect payment, issue receipts and simple book-keeping.
  • Perform administrative duties such as filing, data entry, checking mail and stock-taking.
  • Perform other duties as may be assigned from time to time, such as assisting in preparing, sterilising and maintenance of dental instruments and clinic facilities.

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.

entry.title: NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia Vacancies DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ)

link.title: NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia Vacancies DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ)

entry.content:
NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ) position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ)
Responsibilities
  • To ensure safe, efficient and effective management of the daily operations of NKF Dialysis Centres.
  • To effectively supervise Centre Managers & Staff Nurses in-charge in carrying out their daily duties.
  • To ensure high quality patient care services are provided at NKF centres.
  • To conduct and assist in the investigation of complaints and report to the Secretariat
  • To ensure that the Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), Risk Management and Quality Controls are adopted and followed by all staff at NKF centres.
  • To reduce operating cost at NKF dialysis centres by monitoring the usage of consumables, medication, laboratory tests, RO water analysis and utilities.
  • To maintain a staff to patient ratio of 1: 6 i.e. 1 staff nurse and for every 6 patients.
  • To conduct 3 monthly visits to each centre outside Klang Valley and monthly visits to Klang Valley centres or as and when it is necessary.
  • To help plan and implement Continuous Medical Education (CME) and training such as Seminars and Workshops for medical support staff
  • To provide leadership, skill, supervision, training and updates to medical support staff.
  • To ensure discipline among medical support staff and that all activities run smoothly and efficiently.
Requirements
  • Staff Nurse or Medical Assistant with Renal Nursing Certificate
  • At least 15 years working experience in dialysis with 10 years at Managerial level
  • Strong interpersonal skills and able to interact with all levels of people
  • Good team player
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Good presentation & organizational skills
  • Able to drive & possess own transport
  • Resourceful, creative & able to work independently with minimum supervision
  • Possess strong problem solving/decision making skills
  • Possess technical and medical knowledge on all related hemodialysis procedures and management of dialysis centres

Company Overview

We are an NGO that operates 28 dialysis centres which provide care  to 1500 patients nationwide, with over 400 staff. We are now seeking a committed and service oriented person to fill the position in our company.
ABOUT NKF
From our humble beginnings when we first registered in the year 1969, National Kidney Foundation of Malaysia (NKF) strives to raise the standards of care we provide to patients with kidney failure and those who are suffering from various kidney-related diseases. In 1993, we opened the doors of our first dialysis centre at Jalan Hang Lekiu, Kuala Lumpur. Over the years, NKF has grown tremendously with the support from many parties. NKF has expanded its role from being just a dialysis treatment provider, to becoming a one-stop national resource centre for all kidney-related matters.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Petaling Jaya.
Apply Online
entry.summary: NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ) which positioned at Petaling Jaya

entry.title: Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd Vacancies Director of Nursing

link.title: Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd Vacancies Director of Nursing

entry.content:
Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Director of Nursing position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

​JOB DESCRIPTION :
Administrative Duties and Responsibilities
1. Maintain and uphold the discipline and standards of the nursing team. 
2. Ensure number of nursing staff meet the level of acuity of the hospital census.
3. Ensure duties assigned to all nursing personnel are consistent with their education, experience, licensure and/or certification. 
4. Ensure policies and procedures are in place.
5. Develop positive employee relations, incentives and recognition programmes. Promote teamwork, mutual respect, effective communication and build trust culture
6. Develop realistic management plans that reflect the strategic direction and performance objectives of the nursing services and organization.
7. Function as a mediator and resource person across departmental lines.
8. Recommend and ensure adequate equipment is available and safe for use throughout the nursing units. 
9. Attend or conduct regular meetings to update clinical and management related issues to the nursing and management teams. 
10. Support and promote the hospital services as and when required.
MOH, Nursing Board and Local Authorities’ Guidelines
1. Ensure that the Malaysian Nursing Board, MOH guidelines and Local Authorities guidelines are consistently adhered to.
Clinical Duties and Responsibilities
1. Resolve nursing issues, ensure smooth uninterrupted nursing operations.
2. Report any significant issues related to patient safety and care to Medical Director/PIC/CEO/COO (where applicable).
3. Review infection control surveillance reports to identify trends and to develop effective actions to control and prevent infections in collaboration with Infection Control Team
Nursing Risks Management and Quality Improvement
1. Demonstrate knowledge of, and application of Key Clinical Quality Indicators; proactively monitor and implement systems to achieve and/or surpass company thresholds.
2. Ensure that the clinical incidences are reported, and appropriate actions are taken.
3. Develop annual departmental goals and objectives and monitor the outcomes.
4. Develop, direct and supervise Nursing Leaders in the preparation, documentation and implementation of accreditation initiatives.
Nursing Staff Development 
1. Oversee and guide the staff development programmes to meet the required standards.  
2. Encourage and promote optimal learning environment for all nurses. 
3. Support all nursing staff orientation, on-job training and competency skill development programmes.
4. Direct and participate in teaching and learning to enhance the concepts of leadership among the nursing teams.
5. Develop the clinical skills of nursing staff and ensure that nursing staff are privileged on specialised procedures.
6. Remain up to date with clinical and managerial developments in health care. 
**To undertake any other duties as delegated by the immediate superior.
QUALIFICATION & EXPERIENCE :
  • At least 15 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): Valid Annual Practising Certificate
  • Preferably Senior Manager specialized in Healthcare - Nurse/Medical Support & Assistant or equivalent.
  • Registered Nurse (RN) as recognized by the Nursing Board of Malaysia.
  • Post Basic Certification / Advanced Diploma.
  • Valid Annual Practicing Certificate (APC)
  • Preferably Bachelors/Degree/Master in Nursing (or the equivalent qualification relevant to Nursing).
  • A minimum of 15 years of nursing experience with at least 2-5 years in Nursing Administration / Management.
  • Good interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Good working knowledge of Microsoft office.
  • Knowledge of professional nursing principles and practices.
  • Possess excellent interpersonal skills.
  • Impart exemplary and professional approach in all undertakings.
  • Strong organizational skills.
  • A self-starter, resourceful, possess initiative with the ability to work independently.
  • Must maintain confidentiality.
  • Willing to relocate and travel to hospitals within the Group.
  • Able to work with all levels of staff.

Company Overview

Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd (PMCSB) is a wholly owned subsidiary of Pantai Holdings Berhad (PHB), a company involved in the hospital and healthcare industry. PMCSB provides management support such as administration, training, research and development services to PHB and its subsidiaries

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Batu Pahat.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Pantai Medical Centre Sdn Bhd is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Director of Nursing which positioned at Batu Pahat
